DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response indicating whether study participant submitted the Supportive Care Needs Survey-Short Form 34 (SCNS-SF35).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Participant Supportive Care Needs Survey-Short Form 34 Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any individiual that has a role in a study, including study personnel and study subjects.:A 34 item questionnaire that measures a cancer patient's need and level of need for supportive care across five domains: physical and daily living; psychological; sexuality; patient care and support; and health system and information needs._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any individiual that has a role in a study, including study personnel and study subjects.

Concepts.definition: Any individiual that has a role in a study, including study personnel and study subjects.
